description: Manual hall code and address overrides for fine-tuning

overrides.zusatzinfo: Stadtteilschule Bergstedt, Volksdorfer Damm/ Ecke Bergstedter Alte Landstrasse

instructions.usage: Add hall entries to the 'overrides' array to manually specify hall data

fields.kürzel: Hall code (required) - must match exactly with hall codes in the schedule
fields.name_bezeichnung: Hall name/type (optional) - will replace scraped name
fields.adresse: Full address (optional) - will replace scraped address
fields.plz: Postal code (optional) - will replace scraped postal code
fields.ort: City name (optional) - will replace scraped city
fields.zusatzinfo: Additional information like directions, notes (optional) - will replace scraped info

behavior.update_existing: If hall code exists in scraped data, fields will be updated
behavior.add_new: If hall code doesn't exist, a new hall entry will be created
behavior.override_priority: JSON overrides take precedence over scraped data

examples.correct_address: Use to fix incorrect addresses from website
examples.add_missing_halls: Add halls that are missing from the website
examples.update_info: Update additional information like directions or access notes
